overview: Quartette takes place in a dangerously divided world masked in normality, where Ava and Jewel have found solace and safety in each other. When a lone gunman attacks, they are quickly made third and fourth wheels to a car driven by disaster. In order to survive, Ava must reveal more than a few secrets about her past that force the couple to reckon with dangerous surprises in their relationship.
title: Quartette
